homeDummytext: Dlool is a colloborative and open homeworkbook.
name: name
register.username.tooltip: This is your username, it must be unique
register.name.tooltip: This is your name, it doesn't need to be unique. Please don't use your real name.
register.school.tooltip: This is your school. Insert the uniquename of the school here. Currently it is not possible to find out what the uniquename is.
register.class.tooltip: This is your class. Insert the name of your class here.
register.password.tooltip: This is your password, if you loose it, it's lost forever, it is impossible to get it again! But still please choose a secure password!
register.requestCreated: Your request has been created, you will be able to login once your request has been accepted
login.password.tooltip: This is your password, if you forgot it, it is impossible to get it again!
homework.add.subject: Subject
homework.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this homework?
footer.liscence.text: Liscenced under the GNU General Public License Version 2
settings.success: Updated your profile! Redirect to login in 5 seconds
settings.username.tooltip: This will be your new username
settings.name: Name
settings.name.tooltip: This will be your new name, please don't use your real name
settings.password.tooltip: This will be your new password, please choose a secure one
tricks.install.text: You can install Dlool to your homescreen, so it behaves like an app.
request.list.title: Your requests
request.list.noData: There are not requests to show
request.list.accepted.none: This user isn't accepted in any class
account.delete.confirm.1: Are you sure you want to delete your account, that can't be undone!
account.delete.confirm.2: Are you really really sure you want to delete your account? That is the last warning!!!
